name: mega-footer-04
description: Feature-focused footer with three avatar icon cards highlighting services (delivery, payment, returns), followed by standard footer with contact info and app downloads

files.content:
// React Imports
import type { SVGAttributes } from 'react'

const Logo = (props: SVGAttributes<SVGElement>) => {
  return (

    </svg>
  )
}

export default Logo
